trans-unit.target: “探索性数据分析永远不可能是故事的全部，但是没有其他东西可以作为基础。” —约翰·图基

trans-unit.source: , and in this case specify this is the

1. Machine Learning Capability Mapping - Separation of capabilities, breaking the machine learning vertical into a set of decoupled and targeted layers of discrete and refined actions that collectively present a human lead (ethical AI) base truth to the next set of capabilities. This not only allows improved transparency of, what is, a messy and sometimes confusing set of discovery orientated coded ideas but also loosely couples and targets activities that are, generally, complex and specialized into identifiable and discrete capabilities that can be chained as separately allocated activities.
trans-unit.target: 1.机器学习能力图谱--能力的分离,将机器学习纵向分解成一组解耦的、有针对性的层层离散和细化的行动,这些行动共同向下一组能力呈现出人类主导(伦理人工智能)的基础真相。这不仅可以提高透明度,什么是乱七八糟的、有时令人困惑的一套以发现为导向的编码思想,而且还可以将一般来说是复杂的、专门的活动松散地耦合和锁定为可识别的、离散的能力,作为单独分配的活动进行连锁。

trans-unit.source: 2. Add the export command for each environment variable setting your preferred paths in this example I am setting them to a demo projects folder
trans-unit.target: 2.为每个环境变量添加导出命令,设置你喜欢的路径,在这个例子中,我将它们设置为演示项目文件夹。

trans-unit.source: 2. Parametrized Intent - A unique technique extracting the ideas and thinking of the data scientist from their discovery code and capturing it as intent with parameters that can be replayed against productionized code and data. This decoupling and Separation of Concern between data, code and the intent of actions from that code on that data, considerably improves time to market, code reuse, transparency of actions and the communication of ideas between data scientists and product delivery specialists.
trans-unit.target: 2.参数化意图 ----一种独特的技术,从数据科学家的发现代码中提取出他们的想法和思维,并将其捕捉为带有参数的意图,可以针对生产化的代码和数据进行重放。这种数据、代码和代码对数据的操作意图之间的解耦和分离关注,大大改善了数据科学家和产品交付专家之间的上市时间、代码重用、操作的透明度和想法的沟通。

trans-unit.source: 3. Discovery Transitioning - Discovery Transitioning - is a foundation of the sepatation of concerns between data provisioning and feature selection. As part of the Accelerated ML discovery Vertical, Transitioning is a foundation base truth facilitating a transparent transition of the raw canonical dataset to a fit-for-purpose canonical dataset to enable the optimisation of discovery analysis and the identification of features-of-interest, for the data scientist and created boundary separation of capabilities decoupling the Data Scientist for the Data Engineer. As output it also provides ‘intelligent Communication’, not only to the Data Scientist through canonical fit-for-purpose datasets, but more generally offers powerful visual discovery tools and artefact generation for production architects, data and business SME’s, Stakeholders and is the initiator of Augmented Knowledge for an enriched and transparent shared view of the extended data knowledge.
trans-unit.target: 3.发现过渡-发现过渡-是数据供应和功能选择之间关注点分离的基础。作为“加速的ML发现垂直”的一部分，“过渡”是一个基础知识，可促进原始规范数据集向适合用途的规范数据集的透明过渡，从而能够优化发现分析和识别感兴趣的特征，为数据科学家服务，并创建了功能界限，从而将数据科学家与数据工程师分离。作为输出，它不仅提供“智能交流”，不仅通过适合用途的规范数据集为数据科学家提供信息，而且更广泛地为生产架构师，数据和商业SME提供强大的视觉发现工具和人工制品生成，利益相关者，并且是扩展知识的发起者，以获取扩展数据知识的丰富而透明的共享视图。

trans-unit.source: 3. In addition to the default environment variables you can set specific component environment variables. This is particularly useful with the Transition component as source data tends to sit separate from our interim storage. For Transition you replace the
trans-unit.target: 3.除了默认的环境变量,你还可以设置特定的组件环境变量。这对Transition组件特别有用,因为源数据往往与我们的临时存储分开。对于Transition来说,您可以将

trans-unit.source: 4. Feature Cataloguing – With cross over skills within machine learning and advanced data heuristics, investigation identified commonality and separation across customer engagements that particularly challenged our Ph.D data scientists in their effective delivery of customer success. As a result the project designed and developed Feature Cataloguing, a machine learning technique of extracting and engineering features and their characteristics appropriately parameterized for model selection. This technique implements a juxta view of how features are characterized and presented to the modelling layer. Traditionally features are directly mapped as a representation of the underlying data set. Feature Cataloguing treats each individual feature as its own individual set of characteristics as its representation. The resulting outcome considerably improves experimentation, cross feature association, even when unrelated in the original data sets, and the reuse of identified features-of-interest across use case and business domains.
trans-unit.target: 4.功能分类-利用机器学习和高级数据启发式技术中的交叉技能，调查确定了客户参与的共性和分离性，这尤其挑战了我们的博士数据科学家如何有效地交付客户成功。结果，该项目设计并开发了Feature Cataloguing，这是一种机器学习技术，用于提取和工程化特征及其特征，并为模型选择适当地设置了参数。该技术实现了特征的表征以及如何将其呈现给建模层的并列视图。传统上，要素直接映射为基础数据集的表示。特征编录将每个单独的特征视为其自己的单独特征集作为其表示。所产生的结果大大改善了实验，跨功能关联（即使在原始数据集中不相关时）以及跨用例和业务域重复使用已识别的感兴趣功能。
4.2概念图模型准备的八个阶段

trans-unit.source: 5. Augmented Knowledge - This the ability to capture information on data, activities and the rich stream of subject matter expertise, injected into the machine learning discovery vertical to provide an Augmented n-view of the model build. This includes security, sensitivity, data value scaling, dictionary, observations, performance, optimization, bias, etc. This enriched view of data allows, amongst other things, improved knowledge share, AI explainability, feature transparency, and accountability that feeds into AI ethics, and insight analysis.
trans-unit.target: 5.Augmented Knowledge--这是捕捉数据、活动和丰富的主题专业知识流信息的能力,注入机器学习发现垂直领域,提供模型构建的Augmented n视图。这包括安全性、敏感性、数据值缩放、字典、观测值、性能、优化、偏差等。这种丰富的数据视图可以让,提高知识共享、AI可解释性、特征透明性和责任感,从而反馈到AI伦理、洞察分析中。

trans-unit.source: AI-STAC is a change of approach in terms of improving productivity of the data scientists. This approach deconstructs the machine learning discovery vertical into a set of capabilities, ideas and knowledge. It presents a completely novel approach to the traditional process automation and model wrapping that is broadly offered as a solution to solve the considerable challenges that currently restrict the effectiveness of machine learning in the enterprise business.
trans-unit.target: AI-STAC在提高数据科学家的生产力方面是一种方法的改变。这种方法将机器学习发现垂直领域解构为一套能力、想法和知识。它对传统的流程自动化和模型包装提出了一种全新的方法,广泛地提供了一种解决方案,以解决目前限制机器学习在企业业务中的有效性的相当大的挑战。

trans-unit.source: Advanced data cleaning, data wrangling and feature extraction tools for ML engineers
trans-unit.target: 为ML工程师提供先进的数据清洗、数据整理和特征提取工具。

trans-unit.source: Augmented Intent - Single Task Accelerator components (AI-STAC) is a unique approach to data recovery, discovery, synthesis and modeling that innovates the approach to data science and it’s transition to production. it’s origins came from an incubator project that shadowed a team of Ph.D. data scientists in connection with the development and delivery of machine learning initiatives to define measurable benefit propositions for customer success. From this, a number of observable ‘capabilities’ were identified as unique and separate concerns. The challenges of the data scientist, and in turn the production teams, were to effectively leveraging that separation of concern and distribute and loosely couple the specialist capability needs to the appropriate skills set.
trans-unit.target: 增强的意图-单任务加速器组件（AI-STAC）是一种用于数据恢复，发现，综合和建模的独特方法，该方法创新了数据科学方法并向生产过渡。它的起源来自一个孵化器项目，该项目掩盖了一个博士团队。数据科学家，负责开发和交付机器学习计划，以定义可衡量的客户成功提议。由此可见，许多可观察到的“能力”被确定为独特且独立的关注点。数据科学家以及生产团队的挑战是有效地利用关注点的分离，并将专家的能力需求与适当的技能组合进行松散耦合。

trans-unit.source: Augmented Knowledge (observation, visualisation, knowledge, value scale)
trans-unit.target: 增强知识(观察、可视化、知识、价值尺度)

trans-unit.source: Born out of the frustration of time constraints and the inability to show business value within a business expectation, this project aims to provide a set of tools to quickly produce visual and observational results. It also aims to improve the communication outputs needed by ML delivery to talk to Pre-Sales, Stakholders, Business SME’s, Data SME’s product coders and tooling engineers while still remaining within familiar code paragigms.
trans-unit.target: 由于时间限制的困扰以及无法在业务期望范围内显示业务价值，该项目旨在提供一组工具来快速产生视觉和观察结果。它还旨在改善ML交付所需的通信输出，以与售前，Stakholders，Business SME，Data SME的产品编码人员和工具工程师进行对话，同时仍保持熟悉的代码范式。

trans-unit.source: Connectivity (data sourcing and persisting, fit-for-purpose, quality, quantity, veracity, connectivity)
trans-unit.target: 连接性(数据来源和持久性、适合目的、质量、数量、真实性、连接性)

trans-unit.source: Data Attribution (attribute mapping, quantitative attribute characterisation. predictor selection)
trans-unit.target: 数据归属(属性图谱、量化属性特征。预测器选择)

trans-unit.source: Data Discovery (filter, selection, typing, cleaning, valuing, validating)
trans-unit.target: 数据发现(过滤、选择、打字、清洗、估值、验证)。

trans-unit.source: Discovery Transition is first and key part of an end to end process of discovery, productization and tooling. It defines the ‘intelligence’ and business differentiators of everything downstream.
trans-unit.target: 发现过渡是发现，产品化和工具端到端过程的第一和关键部分。它定义了下游所有事物的“智能”和业务差异。

trans-unit.source: Feature Engineering (feature modelling, dirty clustering, time series, qualitative feature characterisation)
trans-unit.target: 特征工程(特征建模、脏聚类、时间序列、定性特征描述)

trans-unit.source: Feature Framing (hypothesis function, specialisation, custom model framing, model/feature selection)
trans-unit.target: 特征框架(假设功能、专业化、自定义模型框架、模型/特征选择)

trans-unit.source: Finally, and optionally, we set up a Data Dictionary Connector that allows us to output a data dictionary of the source or persist schema to a persisted state that can be shared with other parties of interest. .. code-block:: python
trans-unit.target: 最后,也是可选的,我们设置一个数据字典连接器,允许我们输出源或持久化模式的数据字典,以持久化的状态与其他相关方共享。...代码块::python

trans-unit.source: Firstly we need to set up the ‘Source Contract’ that specifies the data to be sourced. Because we are taking advantage of the environment variable
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们需要建立“源合同”来指定要获取的数据。因为我们正在利用环境变量

trans-unit.source: If you are on linux or MacOS:

In addition the need to remove the opaque nature of the machine learning end-to-end required better transparency and traceability, to better inform to the broadest of interested parties and be able to adapt without leaving being the code ‘sludge’ of redundant ideas. AI-STAC is a disruptive innovation, changing the way we approach the challenges of Machine Learning and Augmented Inelegance, introduces the ideas of ‘Single Task Adaptive Component’ around the core concept of ‘Parameterised Intent’
trans-unit.target: 另外，需要消除端到端机器学习的不透明特性，这需要更好的透明性和可追溯性，以便更好地通知最广泛的相关方，并且能够适应而不会成为多余想法的代码“污点”。AI-STAC是一项颠覆性创新，改变了我们应对机器学习和增强型优雅的挑战的方式，围绕“参数化意图”的核心概念引入了“单任务自适应组件”的思想

trans-unit.source: In order to ease the startup of tasks a number of environment variables are available to pre-assign where and how configuration and data can be collected. This can considerable improve the burden of setup and help in the migration of the outcome contracts between environments.
trans-unit.target: 为了简化任务的启动,有许多环境变量可用于预先指定收集配置和数据的位置和方式。这可以大大改善设置的负担,并有助于在环境之间迁移结果合同。

trans-unit.source: In the following example we are assuming a local file reference and are using the default AI-STAC Connector Contracts for Data Sourcing and Persisting, but this is not the limit of how one can use connect to data retrieval and storage. Examples of other connectors include AWS S3, Hive, Redis, MongoDB, Azure Blob Storage, or specific connectors can be created very quickly using the AS-STAC foundation abstracts.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的例子中,我们假设的是本地文件引用,并使用默认的AI-STAC连接器合约进行数据来源和持久化,但这并不是人们使用连接到数据检索和存储的极限。其他连接器的例子包括AWS S3、Hive、Redis、MongoDB、Azure Blob存储,或者使用AS-STAC基础抽象可以非常快速地创建特定的连接器。

trans-unit.source: In this section we will look at a couple of primary environment variables and demonstrate later how these are used in the Component. In the following example we are assuming a local file reference but this is not the limit of how one can use the environment variables to locate date from multiple different connection mediums. Examples of other connectors include AWS S3, Hive, Redis, MongoDB, Azure Blob Storage, or specific connectors can be created very quickly using the AS-STAC foundation abstracts.
trans-unit.target: 在本节中,我们将查看几个主要的环境变量,并在后面演示如何在组件中使用这些变量。在下面的例子中,我们假设的是本地文件引用,但这并不是一个人如何使用环境变量从多个不同的连接介质中定位日期的极限。其他连接器的例子包括AWS S3、Hive、Redis、MongoDB、Azure Blob存储,或者使用AS-STAC基础抽象可以非常快速地创建特定的连接器。

trans-unit.source: Model Predict (learning, feedback loops, opacity testing, insight, profiling, stabilization)
trans-unit.target: 模型预测(学习、反馈循环、不透明度测试、洞察力、剖析、稳定)。
模型训练(选择、优化、测试、训练)

trans-unit.source: Note: the description should be a short summary of the task. If we need to be more verbose, and as good practice, we can also add notes, that are timestamped and cataloged, to help augment knowledge about this task that is carried as part of the Property Contract.
trans-unit.target: 注:说明应该是任务的简短摘要。如果我们需要更多的文字,作为良好的做法,我们也可以添加注解,这些注解是有时间戳和目录的,以帮助增加关于这项任务的知识,作为财产合同的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Now we have set up the Connector Contracts we no longer need to reference this code again as the information as been stored in the Property Contract. We will look later how we can report on these connectors and observe their settings
trans-unit.target: 现在我们已经设置了连接器合同,我们不再需要再次引用这个代码,因为信息已经存储在属性合同中。我们稍后将查看如何报告这些连接器并观察它们的设置。

trans-unit.source: Once you have instantiated the Transition Task it is important to add a description of the task as a future remind, for others using this task and when using the MasterLedger component (not covered in this tutorial) it allows for a quick reference overview of all the tasks in the ledger.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你实例化了Transition任务,重要的是添加一个任务的描述作为未来的提醒,对于其他使用这个任务的人和使用MasterLedger组件时(本教程中没有涉及),它允许快速参考概述分类账中的所有任务。

trans-unit.source: Open the current user’s profile into a text editor.
trans-unit.target: 在文本编辑器中打开当前用户的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Pandas 0.25.x and above are supported but It is highly recommended to use the latest 1.0.x release as the first major release of Pandas.
trans-unit.target: 支持Pandas 0.25.x及以上版本,但强烈建议使用最新的1.0.x版本作为Pandas的第一个主要版本。

trans-unit.source: Parameterised intent is a core concept and represents the intended action and defining functions of the component. Each method is known as a component intent and the parameters the task parameterisation of that intent. The intent and its parameters are saved and can be replayed using the
trans-unit.target: 参数化意图是一个核心概念,它代表了组件的预期动作和定义功能。每个方法被称为组件意图,参数则是该意图的任务参数化。意图和它的参数被保存下来,并可以使用

trans-unit.source: Python 2.6, 2.7 or 3.5 are not supported. Although Python 3.6 is supported, it is recommended to install
trans-unit.target: 不支持 Python 2.6、2.7 或 3.5。虽然支持Python 3.6,但建议安装

trans-unit.source: Secondly we need to specify where we are going to persist our data once we have transitioned it. Again we are going to take advantage of what our Factory Initialisation method set up for us and allow the Transition task to define our output based on constructed template Connector Contracts.
trans-unit.target: 其次,我们需要指定我们的数据过渡后要持久化的地方。同样我们要利用我们的工厂初始化方法为我们设置的功能,让过渡任务根据构建的模板Connector Contracts来定义我们的输出。

trans-unit.source: The AI-STAC component package for the Transition is

The Transition Component is a ‘Capability’ component and a ‘Separation of Concern’ dealing specifically with the transition of data from connectivity of data source to the persistence of ‘data-of-interest’ that has been prepared appropriate for the language canonical, in this case ‘Pandas DataFrame’.
trans-unit.target: 过渡组件是“功能”组件和“关注分离”，专门处理数据从数据源的连接到持久化“感兴趣的数据”的过渡，该过渡已准备好适用于标准语言。本例为“ Pandas DataFrame”。

trans-unit.source: The best way to install AI-STAC component packages is directly from the Python Package Index repository using pip. All AI-STAC components are based on a pure python foundation package
trans-unit.target: 安装AI-STAC组件包的最好方法是直接从Python包索引库中使用pip安装。所有的AI-STAC组件都是基于一个纯粹的Python基础包。

trans-unit.source: The building and discovery of an ML model can be broken down into three Separation of Concerns (SoC) or Scope of Responsibility (SoR) for the ML engineer and ML model builder.
trans-unit.target: ML模型的建立和发现可以分解为ML工程师和ML模型建立者的三个关注点分离(SoC)或责任范围(SoR)。

trans-unit.source: The concept of being able to quickly run over a single aspect of the ML discovery and then present a stable base for the next layer to iterate against. this micro-iteration approach allows for quick to market adaptive delivery.
trans-unit.target: 能够快速运行在ML发现的单一方面,然后为下一层的迭代提出一个稳定的基础.这种微迭代方法允许快速上市自适应交付的概念。

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to instantiate the
The following sections are a brief description of the intent and its parameters. To retrieve the list of available intent methods in code run:
trans-unit.target: 下面几节是对意图及其参数的简要说明。要检索代码中可用的 intent 方法列表,请运行。

trans-unit.source: The idea behind the conceptual eight stages of Machine Learning is to layer the preparation and reuse of the activities undertaken by the ML Data Engineer and ML Modeller. To provide a platform for micro iterations rather than a constant repetition of repeatable tasks through the stack. It also facilitates contractual definitions between the different disciplines that allows loose coupling and automated regeneration of the different stages of model build. Finally it reduces the cross discipline commitments by creating a ‘by-design’ set of contracts targeted at, and written in, the language of the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 机器学习的概念性八个阶段背后的思想是分层准备和重用ML数据工程师和ML Modeller进行的活动。为微迭代提供一个平台，而不是通过堆栈不断重复可重复任务。它还促进了不同学科之间的合同定义，从而允许松散耦合和自动重建模型构建的不同阶段。最后，它通过针对消费者的语言并以其使用的语言创建一套“按设计”合同来减少跨学科承诺。

trans-unit.source: The package looks to build a set of outputs as part of standard data wrangling and ML exploration that, by their nature, are familiar tools to the various reliant people and processes. For example Data dictionaries for SME’s, Visual representations for clients and stakeholders and configuration contracts for architects, tool builders and data ingestion.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包希望构建一组输出，作为标准数据整理和ML探索的一部分，从本质上来说，它们是各种依赖人员和流程的熟悉工具。例如，中小型企业的数据字典，客户和利益相关者的视觉表示以及架构师，工具制造商和数据提取的配置合同。

trans-unit.source: Though conceptual they do represent a set of needed disciplines and the complexity of the journey to quality output.
trans-unit.target: 虽然是概念性的,但它们确实代表了一套所需的学科,也代表了质量输出历程的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Though we can define as many Connector Contract as we like, by its nature, the Transition task has three key connectors that need to be set up as a ‘one-off’ task. Once these are set they are stored in the Property Contract and thus do not need to be set again.
trans-unit.target: 尽管我们可以定义任意数量的连接器合同，但从本质上讲，“过渡”任务具有三个关键连接器，需要将它们设置为“一次性”任务。设置完这些后，它们将存储在财产合同中，因此无需再次设置。

trans-unit.source: To achieve this, the project offers advanced and specialized programming methods that are unique in approach and novel while maintaining familiarity within common tooling can be identified in four constructs.
trans-unit.target: 为了实现这一目标,该项目提供了先进的和专门的编程方法,这些方法在方法上是独特的和新颖的,同时在常见的工具中保持熟悉性可以在四个构造中确定。

trans-unit.source: To become effective in the Discovery Transition phase, the ability to be able to micro-iterate within distinct layers enables the needed adaptive delivery and quicker returns on ML use case.
trans-unit.target: 为了在发现过渡阶段变得有效,能够在不同的层内进行微创新的能力能够实现所需的适应性交付和更快的ML用例回报。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the list of allowed
We are ready to go. The Transition task is ready to use.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经准备好了。过渡任务可以使用了。

trans-unit.source: We now have our Transition instance and had we previously set it up it will contain all the previously set Property Contract
trans-unit.target: 我们现在有了我们的Transition实例,如果我们之前设置了它,它将包含所有之前设置的Property Contract。

trans-unit.source: With each component task we need to set up its connectivity defining three
trans-unit.target: 对于每个组件任务,我们需要设置其连接性,定义三个

trans-unit.source: a list of headers to drop or filter on type
trans-unit.target: 丢弃或过滤类型的标题列表。

trans-unit.source: a mapping of what to make True and False
a random state should be applied to the test train split. Default is None
trans-unit.target: 随机状态应该被应用到测试列车分割。默认为None

trans-unit.source: a regular expression to search the headers
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式来搜索标题

trans-unit.source: a sample percentage between 0.5 and 1 to avoid over-fitting. Default is 0.85
trans-unit.target: 0.5和1之间的样本百分比,以避免过度拟合。默认为0.85

trans-unit.source: a test percentage split from the df to avoid over-fitting. Default is 0 for no split
trans-unit.target: 从df中分割出一个测试百分比,以避免过度拟合。缺省值为0,表示没有分割。

trans-unit.source: a value to fill nulls that then can be identified as a category type
trans-unit.target: 一个用于填充空值的值,然后可以确定为一个类别类型

trans-unit.source: against the latest Python 3.8.x whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 尽可能针对最新的 Python 3.8.x。

trans-unit.source: also drop any rows where all the values are empty
trans-unit.target: 也会删除所有数值为空的行。

trans-unit.source: auto categorises columns that have a max number of uniqueness with a min number of nulls
trans-unit.target: 自动对具有最大唯一性和最小无效数的列进行分类。

trans-unit.source: auto removes columns that are np.NaN, a single value or have a predominant value greater than.
trans-unit.target: 自动删除np.NaN、单一值或主要值大于的列。

trans-unit.source: can be boolean or a list: if boolean and True then null_list equals [‘NaN’, ‘nan’, ‘null’, ‘’, ‘None’, ‘ ‘] if list then this is considered potential null values.
trans-unit.target: 可以是布尔值，也可以是列表：如果boolean和True，则null_list等于['NaN'，'nan'，'null'，''，'None'，'']如果list则被认为是潜在的空值。

trans-unit.source: can be boolean or a list: if boolean and True then null_list equals [‘NaN’, ‘nan’, ‘null’, ‘’, ‘None’. np.nan, None] if list then this is considered potential null values.
trans-unit.target: 可以是布尔值或列表：如果布尔值和True，则null_list等于['NaN'，'nan'，'null'，''，'None'。np.nan，无]如果列出，则将其视为潜在的空值。

trans-unit.source: class is the encapsulating class for the Transitioning Capability, providing a wrapper for transitioning functionality. and imported as:
trans-unit.target: 类是过渡能力的封装类,为过渡功能提供了一个封装器,并导入为。

trans-unit.source: class is to use Factory Instantiation method
trans-unit.target: 类要使用工厂实例化方法

trans-unit.source: converts column to bool based on the map
trans-unit.target: 根据地图将列转换为布尔。

trans-unit.target: 数据:Canonical的数据,以删除重复的数据。

trans-unit.source: how many decimal places to set the return values. if None then the number is unchanged
trans-unit.target: 设置返回值的小数点位数,如果无,则数字不变。

trans-unit.source: if inplace, returns a formatted cleaner contract for this method, else a deep copy Canonical,.
trans-unit.target: 如果inplace,则返回本方法的格式化清洁合同,否则是深度复制Canonical,。

trans-unit.source: if inplace, returns a formatted cleaner contract for this method, else a deep copy pandas.DataFrame.
trans-unit.target: 如果inplace,则返回该方法的格式化清洁合约,否则返回一个深度拷贝pandas.DataFrame。

trans-unit.source: if the auto_category or to_category should be returned
if the date can’t be inferred uses date format eg format=’%Y%m%d’
trans-unit.target: 如果无法推断日期，则使用日期格式，例如format ='％Y％m％d'

trans-unit.source: if the dtype ‘string’ should be used or keep as object type
trans-unit.target: 如果应使用dtype'string'或保留为对象类型

trans-unit.source: if the passed Canonical, should be used or a deep copy
trans-unit.target: 如果通过的Canonical,应该使用或深度复制

trans-unit.source: if the passed pandas.DataFrame should be used or a deep copy
trans-unit.target: 是否应该使用传来的pandas.DataFrame或深层拷贝。

trans-unit.source: if true returns number of days since 0001-01-01 00:00:00 with fraction being hours/mins/secs
trans-unit.target: 如果为true,返回0001-01-01 00:00:00以来的天数,分数为小时/分钟/秒。

trans-unit.source: if true returns the category as a category code
trans-unit.target: 如果为 "true",则返回类别代码

trans-unit.source: if you want to upgrade your current version then using pip install upgrade with:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想升级你当前的版本,然后用pip安装升级。

trans-unit.source: in the Transition Component notes are cataloged within five named sections: * source - notes about the source data that help in what it is, where it came from and any SME knowledge of interest * schema - data schemas to capture and report on the outcome data set * observations - observations of interest or enhancement of the understanding of the task * actions - actions needed, to be taken or have been taken within the task
trans-unit.target: 过渡组件中的注解被归入五个命名的部分。*来源--关于源数据的说明,帮助了解源数据是什么,它来自哪里,以及任何中小企业感兴趣的知识*模式--数据模式,以捕获和报告结果数据集*观察--感兴趣的观察或增强对任务的理解*行动--在任务中需要、将要或已经采取的行动。

trans-unit.source: maximum number of null in the column between 0 and 1. default to 0.7 (70% nulls allowed)
trans-unit.target: 列中0和1之间的最大空值数,默认为0.7(允许70%的空值)。

trans-unit.source: name that we can use going forward to retrieve or re-create our Transition instance with all its ‘Intent’
trans-unit.target: 我们可以用来继续检索或重新创建带有其所有“意图”的Transition实例的名称

trans-unit.source: package is a python/pandas implementation of the AI-STAC Transition component, specifically aimed at Python, Numpy and Pandas based Data Science activities. It is build to be very light weight in terms of package dependencies requiring nothing beyond what would be found in an basic Data Science environment. Its designed to be used easily within multiple python based interfaces such as Jupyter, IDE or command-line python.
trans-unit.target: 包是AI-STAC过渡组件的python/pandas实现,特别是针对基于Python、Numpy和Pandas的数据科学活动。它在包的依赖性方面是非常轻量级的,除了基本的数据科学环境外,不需要任何其他的东西。它被设计成可以在多个基于Python的界面中轻松使用,如Jupyter、IDE或命令行python。

trans-unit.source: re-run your bash_profile and check the variables have been set
trans-unit.target: 重新运行你的bash_profile并检查变量是否已经被设置了

trans-unit.source: sections we use the property method:
trans-unit.target: 部分我们使用属性方法。

trans-unit.source: specifies if to parse with the day first If True, parses dates with the day first, eg %d-%m-%Y. If False default to the a prefered preference, normally %m-%d-%Y (but not strict)
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要先解析日期 如果为真,则先解析日期,例如%d-%m-%Y.如果为假,则默认为首选,通常是%m-%d-%Y(但不严格)。如果为False,则默认为首选,通常是%m-%d-%Y (但不严格)。

trans-unit.source: specifies if to parse with the year first If True parses dates with the year first, eg 10/11/12 is parsed as 2010-11-12. If both dayfirst and yearfirst are True, yearfirst is preceded (same as dateutil).
trans-unit.target: 指定是否以年份为先进行解析 如果True以年份为先进行解析,例如10/11/12被解析为2010-11-12.如果dayfirst和yearfirst都是True,则yearfirst被放在前面(与dateutil相同)。如果dayfirst和yearfirst都是True,那么yearfirst会被放在前面(和dateutil一样)。

trans-unit.source: that takes advantage of our environment variables set up in the previous section. in order to differentiate each instance of the Transition Component, we assign it a
trans-unit.target: 为了区分Transition Component的每一个实例,我们给它分配了一个

the column types to include or exclude. Default None else int, float, bool, object, ‘number’
trans-unit.target: 要包括或排除的列类型。默认值为int，float，bool，object，'number'

trans-unit.target: 下面的例子在源目录中添加了一个描述

trans-unit.target: 列中唯一值的最大数量,默认为20。

trans-unit.target: 最小的空值数默认为0.998(99.8%)空值。

trans-unit.source: the percentage max a single field predominates default is 0.998
trans-unit.target: 单个字段的最大百分比默认为0.998。

to exclude or include the dtypes
true if the regex should ignore case. Default is False
trans-unit.target: true,如果regex应该忽略大小写。默认为False。

trans-unit.source: uses ‘brute force’ techniques to removes highly correlated columns based on the threshold,
trans-unit.target: 使用“蛮力”技术根据阈值删除高度相关的列，

trans-unit.source: we only need to pass the source file name. In this example we are also going to pass two ‘optional’ extra parameters that get passed directly to the Source reader,
trans-unit.target: 我们只需要传递源文件名。在此示例中，我们还将传递两个“可选”的额外参数，这些参数直接传递给源阅读器，

trans-unit.source: which control the loose coupling of where data is sourced and persisted to the code that uses it. Though we can define up each Connect Contract, it is easier to take advantage of template connectors set up as part of the Factory initialisation method.
trans-unit.target: 控制数据来源和持久化到使用它的代码的松散耦合。虽然我们可以定义起每个Connect Contract,但利用作为Factory初始化方法的一部分而设置的模板连接器更容易。

trans-unit.source: whick in tern can have multiple text entries, each text keyed by timestamp. through the catalog set is fixed,
trans-unit.target: tern中的whick可以有多个文本条目,每个文本用时间戳进行键入,通过目录集是固定的。

trans-unit.source: with a forth discipline of insight, interpretation and profiling as an outcome. these three SoC’s can be perceived as eight distinct disciplines
trans-unit.target: 并以洞察力，解释力和分析力的第四纪律作为结果。这三个SoC可被视为八个不同的学科

trans-unit.source: { num_value, ‘mean’, ‘mode’, ‘median’ }. Default to 0 - If num_value, then replaces NaN with this number value - If ‘mean’, then replaces NaN with the mean of the column - If ‘mode’, then replaces NaN with a mode of the column. random sample if more than 1 - If ‘median’, then replaces NaN with the median of the column
trans-unit.target: {num_value，'mean'，'mode'，'median'}。默认值为0-如果是num_value，则用该数字值替换NaN-如果为'mean'，则将其替换为列的平均值-如果为'mode'，则将NaN替换为该列的模式。大于1的随机样本-如果为“中位数”，则用列的中位数替换NaN

trans-unit.source: { num_value, ‘mean’, ‘mode’, ‘median’ }. Default to np.nan - If num_value, then replaces NaN with this number value - If ‘mean’, then replaces NaN with the mean of the column - If ‘mode’, then replaces NaN with a mode of the column. random sample if more than 1 - If ‘median’, then replaces NaN with the median of the column
trans-unit.target: {num_value，'mean'，'mode'，'median'}。默认为np.nan-如果为num_value，则用该数字值替换NaN-如果为'mean'，则将其替换为列的均值-如果为'mode'，则将NaN替换为该列的模式。大于1的随机样本-如果为“中位数”，则用列的中位数替换NaN

trans-unit.source: { num_value, ‘mean’, ‘mode’, ‘median’ }. Default to np.nan - If num_value, then replaces NaN with this number value. Must be a value not a string - If ‘mean’, then replaces NaN with the mean of the column - If ‘mode’, then replaces NaN with a mode of the column. random sample if more than 1 - If ‘median’, then replaces NaN with the median of the column
trans-unit.target: {num_value，'mean'，'mode'，'median'}。默认为np.nan-如果为num_value，则用此数字值替换NaN。必须为非字符串值-如果为'mean'，则将NaN替换为列的平均值-如果为'mode'，则将NaN替换为列的众数。大于1的随机样本-如果为“中位数”，则用列的中位数替换NaN

trans-unit.source: {‘ignore’, ‘raise’, ‘coerce’}, default ‘coerce’ - If ‘raise’, then invalid parsing will raise an exception - If ‘coerce’, then invalid parsing will be set as NaN - If ‘ignore’, then invalid parsing will return the input
trans-unit.target: {'ignore'，'raise'，'coerce'}，默认为'coerce'-如果为'raise'，则无效的解析将引发异常-如果为'coerce'，则无效的解析将被设置为NaN-如果为'ignore' ，则无效的解析将返回输入

trans-unit.source: {‘ignore’, ‘raise’, ‘coerce’}, default ‘coerce’ }. Default to ‘coerce’ - If ‘raise’, then invalid parsing will raise an exception - If ‘coerce’, then invalid parsing will be set as NaN - If ‘ignore’, then invalid parsing will return the input
trans-unit.target: {'ignore'，'raise'，'coerce'}，默认为'coerce'}。默认为'coerce'-如果为'raise'，则无效的解析将引发异常-如果为'coerce'，则无效的解析将被设置为NaN-如果为'ignore'，则无效的解析将返回输入
